body: The traceback references a file that hasnâ€™t existed for a while.  Can you try this on master?

I'm getting the same error on master but different traceback. I had posted an issue about hashability of dateutil timezones, but it appears there's good reason why they aren't yet. https://github.com/dateutil/dateutil/issues/792

```
In [6]: pd.__version__
Out[6]: '0.24.0.dev0+997.ga197837c4'

In [7]: df2 = df.append(ser2, ignore_index=True)

-> 6499             other = other._convert(datetime=True, timedelta=True)

-> 2352             blocks = self.split_and_operate(None, f, False)

-> 2342             values = fn(v.ravel(), **fn_kwargs)
```
